title: Yogi Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Cafe and juice bar serving vegan and raw food, est. Apr 2015. Has falafel, hummus and pita, guacamole; could create your own salad. Vegan except for bee product. Hosts workshops. NOTE: map is incorrect -- please send exact / correct map coordinates to happycow!
